name: AgentTailor
description: Access your project docs and web search from ChatGPT. AgentTailor assembles optimal context from your uploaded documents to give you accurate, sourced answers about your codebase, specs, and knowledge base.
conversation_starters: Help me understand my project's architecture
Search my docs for authentication implementation details
Assemble context for building a new API endpoint
What projects do I have in AgentTailor?
